cast.overview: Susan, a single mother of two, works as a waitress in a small town. Her son, Henry, is an 11-year-old genius who not only manages the family finances but acts as emotional support for his mother and younger brother. When Henry discovers that the girl next door has a terrible secret, he implores Susan to take matters into her own hands.
cast.title: The Book of Henry

details.biography: Zandi Holup is an actress, known for The Book of Henry (2017), A Birder's Guide to Everything (2013) and Friends and Romans (2014).
details.name: Zandi Holup
